SourceDaughters of Fury pg. 13, Elves of Golarion pg. 23, Alchemy Manual pg. 21
Price 30 gp; Weight -
Category Alchemical Weapons

Description

This thick-shafted arrow contains a reservoir of holy water and is designed to burst upon impact.

A raining arrow damages the target as normal, and also treats the target as though it had been struck by a direct hit from a thrown vial of @Compendium[pf1.items.CmjSKOVJuQnV8o3S]{Holy water}; adjacent creatures take splash damage from this effect.

A raining arrow imparts a -2 penalty on attack rolls because of its weight.

A raining arrow costs 30 gp, and can be crafted with a successful DC 25 Craft (alchemy) check.

Construction

Craft (Alchemy) DC 25
